* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Golf
Full Golf/Dining. Designed for residents of Heritage Harbour, the greater Manatee and Sarasota area, and foreign countries.
Benefits Include:
Unlimited use of course and practice facilities.
Advanced tee time booking.
Complimentary USGA handicap service.
18 Hole PP cart fee $29.00. 9 Hole PP cart fee $20.00, after 3pm twilight golf $25.00.
30% Off Lunch at Clubhouse Grill.
Well liquor, draft beer, house wine always 2-for-1
Guests of Member golf rates 15% off posted rate.
Initiation Fee – $8,000 (One-Time)
Contact Membership
Family
$455/Mo
Single
$325/Mo
Seasonal (Family)
$395/Mo
Seasonal (Single)
$295/Mo
* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Lighthouse Golf
Full Golf/Dining. Eligibility available to those age 75+. Or those whose age, number of years lived in Heritage Harbour, and number of years participating in a golf membership at Stoneybrook GC or Heritage Harbour GC, combine to total at least the number 75.
Benefits Include:
Unlimited use of course and practice facilities.
Advanced tee time booking.
Complimentary USGA handicap service.
18 Hole PP cart fee $25.00. 9 Hole PP cart fee $20.00, after 3pm twilight $25.00.
30% Off Lunch at Clubhouse Grill.
Well liquor, draft beer, house wine always 2-for-1
Guests of Member golf rates 15% off posted rate.
Initiation Fee – $4,000 (One-Time)
Contact Membership
Family
$395/Yr
Single
$295/Yr
* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Executive
Golf
Defined as an individual or family living in their own residence, working full time, and the older of the two under 45 years old.
Flex-Golf/Dining. Combines flexibility with predictable rates all year.
Benefits Include:
Unlimited use of course and practice facilities.
Advanced Tee Time Booking.
Complimentary USGA Handicap Service.
30% Off Lunch at Clubhouse Grill.
Well liquor, draft beer, house wine always 2-for-1
Twilight golf – after 3pm $25.00 + tax
Initiation Fee – $8,000 (One-Time). Payment Terms Available
Contact Membership
Family
$395/ mo
Single
$295/ mo
* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Seasonal Golf
Defined as a couple or individual that are not Florida residents and do not spend more than 180 days per year in the Manatee/Sarasota area.
Full Golf/Dining. For a couple or individual who are not Florida residents and do not spend more than 180 days per year in the Manatee/Sarasota area.
Benefits Include:
Unlimited use of course and practice facilities.
Advanced tee time booking.
Complimentary USGA handicap service.
18 Hole PP cart fee $25.00. 9 Hole PP cart fee $20.00, after 3pm twilight $25.00.
30% Off Lunch at Clubhouse Grill.
Well liquor, draft beer, house wine always 2-for-1
Guests of Member golf rates 15% off posted rate.
Initiation Fee – $4,000 (One-Time)
Register Now
Adult
$59/Mo
Family Add-On #1
$29/Mo
* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Practice Plus
Practice plus is focused on making you a better player. You can work on your game based on your schedule. Practice for free anytime and play any afternoon you want for a nominal fee.
Benefits Include:
Unlimited Range Balls anytime, and use of practice facilities.
Discounted golf fees all year long. Loyalty rates apply.
30% Off Lunch at Clubhouse Grill.
Well liquor, draft beer, house wine always 2-for-1
After 3pm any day, Golf with cart for nominal cart fee only.
This program requires a minimum six-month continuous commitment. After that, if you want to quit the Club – you can at any time – all we ask is 30 days’ notice and there is no other obligation. This is the best golf program out there. Sign up today and start improving your game.
Register Now
Social/Dining
Dining and Social Events are open to the public – Lighthouse Grill open 7 days a week for lunch and dinner. Come on over!
Club Carts Unlimited Use (Family)
$400/Mo
Club Carts Unlimited Use (Single)
$260/Mo
Private Cart Trail Fee (Extra Club Cart needed charged at published member cart fee rates)
$160/Mo
* (All dues and fees are subject to 7% sales tax)
Own your own cart? Or want unlimited use of the Club’s carts for one fixed monthly fee?
These cart programs provide great value to frequent players.

Come See Us In a Whole New Light
Elevating the Experience
Learn More
Attractive Membership Programs Now Available
The Heritage Harbour Golf Club you’ve come to know and love is evolving into something truly extraordinary. We’ve been working hard to deliver on our promise to create a premier golf experience, and we’re excited to share some of the incredible changes that have already been made, with even more to come!
With our completed course upgrades and planned facility enhancements, this is the season to secure your spot as a Member at Heritage Harbour Golf Club.
Secure the best pricing now, before 2025 gets here.
Inquire Now
The upcoming season at Heritage Harbour is set to be the best yet!
We’ve made significant investments to rebuild and enhance our course, ensuring a fantastic golfing experience for our Members. Now is the perfect time to secure your membership and enjoy everything our recently renovated course has to offer.
Learn More
What does the future look like at Heritage Harbour?
Golf Course renovated Tee to Green (2022)
Our course has been completely modernized with smoother greens, restructured fairways, and redesigned holes, ensuring a fresh and challenging experience with every round you play.
New Fleet of Club Car Golf Carts (Dec 2024)
Experience the future of golf with
our brand new Golf Cart Fleet with Club Car Connect GPS
. Navigate the course with ease and stay connected as you enjoy your round.
Future Clubhouse Improvements (2025)
Experience our upgraded clubhouse and discover a new level
of comfort and luxury:
Bahama-Style Sports Bar:
Relax and unwind after your round with refreshing drinks in our tropical-inspired sports bar.
Gourmet Dining:
Enjoy culinary delights from our new Italian stone-fired pizza oven and sushi bar, all prepared in an open kitchen that
keeps you close to the action.
Resort-Style Amenities (2026)
Indulge in our new resort-style amenities designed for relaxation and entertainment:
New Resort Pool:
Cool off and relax in our brand-new pool with Bahama Bar, offering
a serene escape just steps from the course.
Full-Swing Simulators
:
Perfect your swing or compete with friends in
Two Full-Swing Indoor Golf Simulator Suites
, complete with a comfortable lounge area for in-game relaxation.
Practice Facility & Range
Maximize your time on our upgraded practice facility and driving range and sharpen your skills. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned pro, you’ll find everything you need to take your game to the next level.
Learn More
What’s Included
Unlimited Access
Play as much as you want on our newly upgraded course and practice facilities.
Exclusive Member Benefits
30% off lunch at the Clubhouse Grill.
All Day Everyday, 2-for-1 on draft beer, house wine, and well liquor drinks.
Priority Tee Times
Book your preferred times in advance and enjoy golf on your schedule.
Added Value
Complimentary USGA handicap service and
Generational add-on options for Family.
Register now to speak directly with our Membership Office.
